author: gangolli
msg: The visible text of the src zip link was incorrect and fixed.  The nbsp refs I had introduced in the download.xml were causing unknown entity problems in the build.  I couldn't figure out how to apply the apache-site.dtd without having it strip out much of the content, so I removed the nbsp refs.

author: ryan
msg: adding empty javadoc target for maven build

author: ieb
msg: to pack features/features.txt correctly we must have maven 2.0.8 or later.
